node.title: Three injured after driver fleeing police hits car in Christchurch
node.description: Three people have been injured after a motorist fleeing police smashed into another car in central Christchurch early this morning.
node.content:
["Three people have been injured after a motorist fleeing police smashed into another car in central Christchurch early this morning.", "", "
File photo. Photo: RNZ / Marika Khabazi
", "A police spokesperson said the driver is alleged to have stolen a car from a house in Rangiora and failed to stop for police shortly after 1am.", "The vehicle crashed into a power pole and another car at the intersection of Bealey Avenue and Manchester Street, leaving two people with moderate injuries and a third with minor injuries.", "No arrests have been made yet."]
